tool_description: The Horoscopes API is a JSON API that delivers astrology and daily horoscopes. Every day, the API gives users access to 12 horoscopes prepared by expert astrologers.
title: Daily Horoscopes

api_list.name: Call Daily Horoscopes
api_list.description: The Horoscopes API is a JSON API that delivers astrology and daily horoscopes. Every day, the API gives users access to 12 horoscopes prepared by expert astrologers.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://daily-horoscopes1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "daily-horoscopes1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
